creation_history: Created by Andreas on September 3rd, 2021. Reason: a couple of days earlier, Brian noted ["(I think we need :yakkiss:)"](https://discord.com/channels/830522505605283862/831544568767578162/880934728428056648).
description: Delicious, approved by yak. Used as a replacement for the chef kiss emoji (which also exists on the server), in particular when relating to code.
name: Yakkiss
